title: Attendance shortages
content: How seriously is the attendance shortage criteria being enforced this time? Because I will have high 60s or low 70s in at least one subject once everything is sorted at the end of this week, and I’m genuinely concerned if I’ll get my hall ticket. Please help, whom should I be contacting and what should I be doing right now

comments.body: Contact ur Faculty advisor, they might do something

There are remedial classes and you might be asked to attend them until you cover 75%. If you have attendance like 72-74 just go to teachers and try asking for extra attendance. If it's 70+ ish usually I've heard they don't care
Usually, you'll be fine if it's above 70 in everything. Try getting some medical certificates and just talk to your mentor and ask them if anything can be done
depends on the teacher. but 4 sure u need above 75% in all
